newsitem.title: UK: Lloyds Chemists undecided on advice.
newsitem.headline: Lloyds Chemists undecided on advice.

text.p: Lloyds Chemists finance director Johnathan Fellows said the company is undecided on what advice to give its shareholders after UniChem renewed its bid for the company.

"We have no comment at this stage. We need to meet as a board and we clearly need to have some correspondence with our shareholders. We have not yet resolved what recommendations to make," said Fellows in an interview.
"I would hope to make an announcement in the next few days," he said. "What we will now need to do is to see if we can ascertain Gehe's intentions."
Earlier UniChem offered 16 new UniChem shares and 926p in cash, valuing each LLoyds Chemists share at 505.4p.
